title: Cisco Umbrella DNS - Proxied Traffic
description: -   This dashboard provides detailed information on traffic that has passed through the Umbrella Selective Proxy.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard provides insights into traffic that has passed through the Umbrella Selective Proxy.

## Widgets

 1. Total Proxied Traffic 
 2. Total Blocked Proxied Traffic 
 3. Total Allowed Proxied Traffic 
 4. Proxied Traffic Overtime 
 5. Top Web Content Types 
 6. Top Internal IPs 
 7. Top External IPs 
 8. Traffic Requests by Client IP 
 9. Distribution by Destination IP 
 10. Top Accessed URLs 
 11. Top Denied URLs 
 12. Top Referer URLs 
 13. Request Distribution by Client OS 
 14. Request Distribution by Client Browser 
 15. Distribution by Categories 
 16. Top Identities 
 17. Top Identity Types 
 18. Traffic Distribution by Blocked Categories 
 19. Traffic Distribution by Verdict and Categories 
 20. Request Distribution by Method 
 21. Proxied DNS Responses 
 22. Request Distribution by Isolate State 
 23. Request Distribution by Warn Status 
 24. Bytes Sent Overtime 
 25. Bytes Received Overtime 
 26. Log Details

definition.title: Traffic Distribution by Verdict and Categories
